references.paper_title: Convolutional LSTM network: A machine learning approach for precipitation nowcasting
references.reason: This paper introduces the Convolutional LSTM network, a fundamental architecture for spatiotemporal data modeling which is highly relevant to video prediction.

references.paper_title: PredRNN: Recurrent neural networks for predictive learning using spatiotemporal LSTMs
references.reason: This paper introduces PredRNN, one of the first successful recurrent neural network architectures for video prediction, establishing a baseline for the field.

references.paper_title: PredRNN++: Towards a resolution of the deep-in-time dilemma in spatiotemporal predictive learning
references.reason: This paper significantly improves upon PredRNN, addressing limitations in handling long temporal dependencies and achieving state-of-the-art performance.

references.paper_title: Decomposing motion and content for natural video sequence prediction
references.reason: This work proposes a method that decomposes motion and content for video prediction, which is a significant contribution to the field by improving prediction quality and efficiency.

references.paper_title: STRPM: A spatiotemporal residual predictive model for high-resolution video prediction
references.reason: This paper presents STRPM, a state-of-the-art model for video prediction which sets a strong benchmark for performance comparison and is directly compared against in the current paper.
